title: Socialist Autonomous Province of Vojvodina
summary: The Socialist Autonomous Province of Vojvodina (Serbian: Социјалистичка Аутономна Покрајина Војводина, romanized: Socijalistička Autonomna Pokrajina Vojvodina) was one of two autonomous provinces within the Socialist Republic of Serbia, in the former Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia. The province is the direct predecessor to the modern-day Vojvodina.
